PROJECT(OpenALSDK)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

IF(COMMAND cmake_policy)
	CMAKE_POLICY(SET CMP0003 NEW)
ENDIF(COMMAND cmake_policy)

SET(OPENALSDK_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${OPENALSDK_DIR}/../..")

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Compiler.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Build/CMake/ExternalCommon.cmake)

SET(KLAYGE_BIN_DIR "${OPENALSDK_DIR}/../../KlayGE/bin/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(OPENAL_NAME "OpenAL32.dll")
SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/OpenALSDK.7z")
SET(SEVENZIP_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z")
SET(PACKAGE_COMMIT_ID "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
SET(PACKAGE_FILE_ID "4d72bf79d1850aa0d0a03a27dcc3db86424a623c")

DOWNLOAD_PACKAGE("OpenALSDK" ${REL_PATH} ${PACKAGE_COMMIT_ID} ${PACKAGE_FILE_ID})

SET(SRC_PATH "${OPENALSDK_DIR}/redist/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/${OPENAL_NAME}")
SET(REDIST_PATH "${KLAYGE_BIN_DIR}/${OPENAL_NAME}")
ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(OUTPUT ${REDIST_PATH}
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_if_different ${SRC_PATH} ${REDIST_PATH})
ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(Redist ALL DEPENDS ${REDIST_PATH})
